actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of September 18, 1964, authorizing the addition of lands to Morristown National Historical Park in the State of New Jersey.

summary.text: Increases to 300 acres (previously 281) the land to be procured for the Morristown National Historical Park in the State of New Jersey. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as necessary to acquire such land. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 409g)

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of September 18, 1964, authorizing the addition of lands to Morristown National Historical Park in the State of New Jersey.
